ask_name_exception: 'The %1$s name "%2$s" is invalid, it should be lowercase,  corresponding to: [a-z0-9_.-]+'
group_not_found: The group name "%1$s" could not be found, in "%2$s" groups.
action_not_found: The action argument "%s" could not be found.
delete_exception: You must first deactivate the group to delete it.
run_tasks_exception: You must first activate the group to run it.
